lead_paragraph: The former world champion Mario Cipollini is set to make a return to professional cycling at 40, his lawyer said. Cipollini will race for the Rock and Republic team in the United States and will train young cyclists.“He’s not coming back to try and win,” the lawyer, Giuseppe Napoleone, said, according to the news agency ANSA. Napoleone added, “It’s a young team that has asked Mario to take part in certain races for image reasons.”.
